header: Imitation, flattery, you know how the saying goes. Seems that our Neil tapped into something good, for the upcoming New York City Hackaton is going to have its own mini-CPAN PR Challenge -- which I find brilliant. In other news, Perl 5.22 is around the corner (yay!), and so is conference season. Hmmm... Which means I should probably begin to see what my Summer schedule should look like. And so should you, dear reader, so should you. ~ `/anick
subject: The CPAN PR Challenge Now Has a Mini-Me!
